fulltext:
Nguyễn M Hưng 
Front-End Engineering | UX/UI |ReactJS | React native | NodeJS 
Ba Hat Str. 
HCM City, Dst 10 
(+84) 090-854-7477 
hung.nguyen@hotmail.com.vn 
Github: github/hungnm11 
Skype: minhhung98 
EXPERIENCE 
Business4you AG, HCM Vietnam — Senior Front-End 
MARCH 2019 - JULY 2019 
Using ReactJS to develop new UI functionality for multithreaded 
user-facing applications running on touchscreen devices. Single handedly 
built  new products. Developed and maintained critical components. 
Technologies used in project: ReactJS, UX/UI, Javascript, Bootstrap, 
Material UI, LESS, SASS, RESTful API. 
TTA, HCM Vietnam — Senior Front-End 
DECEMBER  2017 - MARC  2019 
Implemented graphic user interface CMS/products. Leveraged React and 
JavaScript to build new projects/products. Developed and maintained 
critical components. Provide insights regarding engineering bounds of 
features, feasibility and time required. 
Technologies used in project: ReactJS, UX/UI, Javascript, jQuery, 
Bootstrap, Material UI, LESS, SASS, RESTful API. 
Sentifi, HCM Vietnam — Front-End Engineering 
APRIL 2016 - JUNE 2017 
Single handedly template product on desktop/tablet/smartphone. 
Cross-browser and cross-platform compatible solutions. Use Bootstrap 
and responsive integrate UI for multi-devices. 
Technologies used in project: UX/UI,  HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery UI, 
Bootstrap 3, LESS, SASS, Grunt, Gulp, RESTful API, ReactJS, React Native.  
Appcamel PTY LTD, HCM Vietnam — Front-End Engineering 
& UX/UI cum Manager 
NOVEMBER 2015 - MARCH 2016 
Implemented a graphic user interface CMS/products. Develop new UI 
functionality for multithreaded user-facing applications running on 
touchscreen devices. 
In charge of the office and software product management of company. 
Managing stakeholder expectations, leading and motivating the 
employees. Supervise and make sound decisions for developing product. 
Learning business, flow and scope of software production. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Javascript 
HTML 
CSS 
LESS 
SASS 
UX/UI 
Graphic Design 
FRAMEWORKS AND MORE 
ReactJS 
React Native 
Redux 
NodeJS 
Express 
ES6 
jQuery 
Bootstrap 
LANGUAGES 
Vietnamese 
English 
Vinasource Inc., HCM Vietnam — Front-End developer & 
UX/UI Design 
AUGUST 2012 - NOVEMBER 2011 
Cross-browser and cross-platform compatible solutions. Work 
HTML5/CSS3/jQuery/Javascript from PSD files using Photoshop, 
Dreamweaver or MS Visual Studio.  
Work with client via email directly.  Design and develop website by 
wordpress. Contributed to the overall development of the web 
development team. 
Technologies used in project:  HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, jQuery UI, 
Bootstrap 2 & 3, Wordpress. 
Sequent Asia IT, HCM Vietnam — Senior web & Mobile 
Designer 
MARCH 2011 - AUGUST 2011 
Design user interface for Website, iPhone and iPad.  In charge of 
deploying /formatting gfx. Assist team members with GUI for websites, 
mobiles 
Playsoft, HCM Vietnam — Digital Artist 
MAY 2010 - FEBRUARY 2011 
Design user interface for iPhone, Bada Samsung, Android and BlackBerry.. 
In charge of deploying /formatting gfx. Assist team members with GUI for 
websites, mobiles 
Techknowledge, HCM Vietnam — Team Leader/Web designer 
DECEMBER 2007 - JANUARY 2009 
Design mockups for websites, logos, brochure and export HTML, CSS for 
website. Flash / Actionscript : www.tknowledge.com is the first flash site 
that I have done by myself. 
Managing a design team. Supervise projects related design. Assign works 
for designers to complete deadline. Assist team members with GUI for 
websites. 
Cleverlearn English Language Center, HCM Vietnam —  
Designer 
JANUARY 2006 - DECEMBER 2007 
View more about me on LinkedIn 
EDUCATION 
University of Natural Science - Ho Chi Minh City 
2002 - 2007 - Finished Computer Science 
Hoa Sen University of Ho Chi Minh City - Certificate of 
Computer-Aided Graphic Art Design 
2005 - 2006 
Vietnam National University - The Diploma of Professional 
Training - IT Computer Networking 
2000 - 2003
